name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flix - Watch Netflix with your buddies!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sync up your Netflix shows and watch them with your buddies!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flix connects you with your friends and loved ones all across the world by syncing up your Netflix shows!
